name: GhostHunt
body:
## What is GhostHunt?
GhostHunt is a gamemode for Garry's Mod that aims to improve the level of immersion when playing on ghost hunt/horror maps, it does this by having special features and offering server owners console commands to control what players can do. It is currently free and will always remain free, anyone can edit and re-upload the gamemode but make sure you credit me!

## Console Commands
Name: gh_flashlight  
Values: 1, 0  
Description: Enable/disable the use of the flashlight  

Name: gh_walkspeed  
Values: 20-300  
Description: Sets the walkspeed of players  

Name: gh_runspeed  
Values: 100-400  
Description: Sets the sprinting speed of players  

## Authors and Contributors
As of right now I (WolfKnight) am the only author that has worked on this gamemode.

## Support or Contact
If you require technical or general support then leave me a message on my Steam profile of what you need help with, if you have found a bug/exploit that needs fixing then submit an issue on the GitHub repo.
